path.wiser.mobile.db
Class WiserDatabase

java.lang.Object
  path.wiser.mobile.db.WiserDatabase

public class WiserDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

This is the database for all data stored on the device. All the traces and images are stored in this and then it is saved to memory. This handles all the query transactions to and from the database. Activity specific queries can be found in their own classes.

Author:
anisbet
